\chapter*{Moodle Mobile}

This is the primary repository of source code for the official Moodle Mobile app.

\begin{itemize}
\item \href{http://docs.moodle.org/en/Moodle_Mobile}{User documentation}
\item \href{http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_Mobile}{Developer documentation}
\item \href{http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Setting_up_your_development_environment_for_Moodle_Mobile_2}{Development environment setup}
\item \href{https://tracker.moodle.org/browse/MOBILE}{Bug Tracker}
\item \href{http://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_Mobile_Release_Notes}{Release Notes}
\end{itemize}
